title: How to Beat Every Level in “This Is the Only Level”

steps.title: Press the red button, and then proceed to the tube that was previously blocked by a green wall.
steps.content: Press the red button, and then proceed to the tube that was previously blocked by a green wall.

steps.title: Repeat the same as stage 1, but to go right press the left arrow key, and to go left press the right arrow key.
steps.content: Repeat the same as stage 1, but to go right press the left arrow key, and to go left press the right arrow key.

steps.title: There is no need to press the red button.
steps.content: There is no need to press the red button. The green wall is already gone.

steps.title: Just click on the orange tube and the elephant will teleport there.
steps.content: Just click on the orange tube and the elephant will teleport there.

steps.title: You shouldn't have to jump.
steps.content: You shouldn't have to jump. Just float to the red button, and then float down to the orange tube.

steps.title: The elephant bounces quite a bit by itself.
steps.content: The elephant bounces quite a bit by itself . Not many people know this, but if you press the up arrow a few times, the bouncing will slow down.

steps.title: You are not allowed to jump.
steps.content: You are not allowed to jump. The spikes act as a trampoline in this stage.

steps.title: Go about your normal business, except avoid the skinny stripes or you will die.
steps.content: Go about your normal business, except avoid the skinny stripes or you will die.

steps.title: Use your cursor to steer your elephant.
steps.content: Use your cursor to steer your elephant. Click to make it jump.

steps.title: There is a wind pushing you back, so be ready to press the right arrow key as soon as the stage starts, otherwise, you will be plummeted towards the spikes.
steps.content: There is a wind pushing you back, so be ready to press the right arrow key as soon as the stage starts, otherwise, you will be plummeted towards the spikes.

steps.title: You are not allowed to go left.
steps.content: You are not allowed to go left.

steps.title: You are not allowed to jump.
steps.content: You are not allowed to jump. Just hold the right arrow key down until you reach the orange tube and you should be fine. You do not need to press the red button.

steps.title: Press the left and right arrow keys in a repetitious pattern like this:
steps.content: Press the left and right arrow keys in a repetitious pattern like this: left, right, left, right, left, right. You do not need to press the red button.

steps.title: You are only allowed to jump once.
steps.content: You are only allowed to jump once. Leap to the red button and then fall and hit the bottom to continue to the orange tube.

steps.title: Refresh your browser.
steps.content: Refresh your browser. Click 'play'. Click 'play or continue level 1'. Proceed to the orange tube.

steps.title: Keep hitting the red button until the green wall goes down.
steps.content: Keep hitting the red button until the green wall goes down.

steps.title: Repeat stage 1.
steps.content: Repeat stage 1.

steps.title: The floor collapses beneath you.
steps.content: The floor collapses beneath you. The red button doesn't work. Go over the orange tube and the floor will collapse, bringing you to the orange tube.

steps.title: The same as stage 1, except you stutter.
steps.content: The same as stage 1, except you stutter.

steps.title: The spikes, platforms, and button are not visible, but they are there.
steps.content: The spikes, platforms, and button are not visible, but they are there.

steps.title: Every other stripe makes you float to the top.
steps.content: Every other stripe makes you float to the top.

steps.title: There is an invisible bar beneath the upper-most platform.
steps.content: There is an invisible bar beneath the upper-most platform. Go over it.

steps.title: Use the 'F', 'T', and 'H' keys to move instead of the arrow keys.
steps.content: Use the 'F', 'T', and 'H' keys to move instead of the arrow keys.

steps.title: Hold the CAPS LOCK button down to go through the green wall.
steps.content: Hold the CAPS LOCK button down to go through the green wall.

steps.title: The green wall doesn't go down for you.
steps.content: The green wall doesn't go down for you. It just goes whenever it feels like it so get to the green wall as fast as you can.

steps.title: The green wall isn't really there.
steps.content: The green wall isn't really there. You can go through it.

steps.title: Click 'menu', then 'credits', then click 'main menu, and unlock stage 27 for me', and last click 'play or continue level 1'.
steps.content: Click 'menu', then 'credits', then click 'main menu, and unlock stage 27 for me', and last click 'play or continue level 1'. Make your way to the orange tube.

steps.title: Just like stage 1, except it's zoomed up really close.
steps.content: Just like stage 1, except it's zoomed up really close.

steps.title: The green wall closes itself very shortly after you unlock it, so be quick!
steps.content: The green wall closes itself very shortly after you unlock it, so be quick!

steps.title: When you start moving the lights turn off.
steps.content: When you start moving the lights turn off.

steps.title: Repeat stage 1.
steps.content: Repeat stage 1.

steps.title: Repeat same as stage 19.
steps.content: Repeat same as stage 19. expect you stutter again.

steps.title: Repeat stage 3.
steps.content: Repeat stage 3.

steps.title: You are only allowed to jump once.
steps.content: You are only allowed to jump once. Just hold the right arrow key down until you reach the orange tube and you should be fine.

steps.title: The black background, spikes, platforms, and button are not visible, but they are there.
steps.content: The black background, spikes, platforms, and button are not visible, but they are there.

steps.title: Repeat stage 1.
steps.content: Repeat stage 1.

steps.title: Just like stage 25, expect it's zoomed up really close.
steps.content: Just like stage 25, expect it's zoomed up really close.

steps.title: You are allowed to jump.
steps.content: You are allowed to jump. The spikes act as a trampoline in this stage.

steps.title: Repeat stage 10.
steps.content: Repeat stage 10.

steps.title: Repeat same as stage 29.
steps.content: Repeat same as stage 29.
